com.sorcix.sirc

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sorcix.sirc.User

  • public final class User
extends Object
    Represents a user on the IRC server.
    Author:
    Sorcix

        Returns:

      • sendCtcp

        public void sendCtcp(String command)
        Sends CTCP request. This is a very primitive way to send CTCP commands, other methods are preferred.
        Parameters:
        command - Command to send.

      • sendCtcpAction

      • sendCtcpPing

        public long sendCtcpPing()
        Sends a CTCP PING command.
        Returns:
        The timestamp sent to this user.

      • sendCtcpReply

        protected void sendCtcpReply(String command)
        Sends CTCP reply using notices. Replies to CTCP requests should be sent using a notice.
        Parameters:
        command - Command to send.

      • sendCtcpReply

        protected void sendCtcpReply(String command,
                 boolean skipQueue)
        Sends CTCP reply using notices. Replies to CTCP requests should be sent using a notice.
        Parameters:
        command - Command to send.
        skipQueue - Whether to skip the outgoing message queue.

      • sendCtcpVersion

        public void sendCtcpVersion()
        Sends a CTCP VERSION command to this user.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(String message)
        Send message to this user.

        message - The message to send.

      • sendNotice

        public void sendNotice(String message)
        Send notice to this user.
        Parameters:
        message - The notice to send.

      • setCustomAddress

        public void setCustomAddress(String address)
        Sets a custom address for this user. This address will be used to send messages to instead of simply the nickname. Use an address like nick@server. Setting the address to @server will prepend the nick automatically.
        Parameters:
        address - The address to use.

      • setMode

        public void setMode(char mode,
           boolean toggle)
        Changes a user mode for given user.
        Parameters:
        mode - The mode character.
        toggle - True to enable the mode, false to disable.

      • setMode

        public void setMode(String mode)
        Changes a user mode. The address is automatically added. 
         setMode("+m");
        Parameters:
        mode - The mode to change.

      • setNick

        protected void setNick(String nick)
        Changes the nickname of this user.
        Parameters:
        nick - The new nickname.
